page.title: 14Small Industry:Knightsbridge
page.content: {Newman's Icing Industry} The company has been at the Knightsbridge Centre for 2 years.They lease the warehouse for 1 year at a time. They supply and sell equipment for making cakes (e.g tins and ornaments). Cavendish House is an important customer.There are 5 employees.They import from America.When the orders are placed it takes 7 days to fill them. { Wood Plus} Wood Plus first started in St. Georges place,Cheltenham.Rents became too expensive and Mr.Pointer (who is selfemployed) moved to Knightsbridge. Mr.Pointer gets his raw materials from Seven Ply Woods and Black Heath Plastics.He sells mainly timber products.
